PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1997-06681997-04-220,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of the following persons as trustees of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years. (JUDY MacDONALD, of Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island, in the place of Michael Hornstein, whose term has expired; and IRENE SZYLINGER, of Toronto, Ontario, in the place of Janice E. Dymond, whose term has expired)
Attachments
